MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL33 postcode area of Llanfairfechan, affecting properties in Llanerch Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.30PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating reports of third party damage.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.38PM on 5th February 2021
